ValidationRule.description: The user is not able to update the Type field to ‘Additional Store’ or ‘Special Composite’ without populating the ‘Related Full Membership' lookup field.
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: AND( NOT(ISNEW()), ISCHANGED( Type__c ), ISBLANK( Related_Full_Membership__c ), OR( ISPICKVAL( Type__c, "Additional_Store" ), ISPICKVAL( Type__c, "Special_Composite" ) ) )
ValidationRule.errorMessage: You must populate Related Full Membership before changing Type to "Additional Store" or "Special Composite"
